mission.posting: An obscure branch of philosophy, the "Hermetic Alchemists" have a strangely substantial network set up. Some digging implies that their admin has been developing a tool we've wanted our hands on for some time.

email.subject: Hermetic Alchemists
email.body:
It looks like this admin is some sort of trace tech prodigy, but is completely immersed in this alchemy business. Their network is a strange sort of fortress, but we really need to track down the home computer of this admin and get this software.
This is a team project - if you find anything helpful to the team, drop it into the chat. Good luck.

attachments.note: Investigate the network, and track down the home computer of the administrator. From there, download the new trace tracking or prevention software, and upload it to the drop server.
